DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect different dose whey protein intervention ( daily dose 0g , 10g , 20g ) lean body mass , body fat composition muscular function state elderly sacropenia .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Whey Protein Intervention Body Composition Muscle Function Elderly With Sacropenia
DOC.criteria: People age 65 year . Usual gait speed less 0.8m/s . Willing participate study , consume test product perform measurement . nervous system disease . Other disease movement disorder stroke , fracture , arthritis . people unconsciousness complete questionnaire longterm regular use protein antioxidant .
